channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Uganda, where Zohran Mamdani was born, NYC mayoral hopeful is recalled with pride
America’s top 10 richest saw their wealth grow by $700 billion combined under Trump: report
A medieval tower in Rome partially collapses with a firefighter inside
For many Venezuelans, economic fears trump concerns of US military action
Matt Gaetz Gets Absolutely Ruined by All-Time Community Note: ‘He Had Sex With a 17-Year-Old’
Government shutdown feud between Democrats and Republicans drags on as SNAP recipients struggle
item.description: The government shutdown continues as Democrats and Republicans remain at odds over a funding plan. Meanwhile, SNAP recipients across the U.S. are conc...

item.title: Is COVID-19 during pregnancy linked to autism? New study offers clues
item.description: A large study from Massachusetts found that babies whose mothers had COVID-19 while pregnant were slightly more likely to have a range of neurodevelop...

item.title: Avalanche on Nepal mountain Yalung Ri kills 7 including foreign climbers
item.description: Officials in Nepal say an avalanche swept through a camp on Mount Yalung Ri on Monday and killed five foreign climbers and two Nepali guides

item.title: WATCH: Medieval tower partially collapses in Rome
item.description: One worker was critically injured and another trapped in the collapse, authorities said.

item.title: 2025 elections in NYC, New Jersey, Virginia to test Democrats, Trump
item.description: Election Day 2025 is almost here, with consequential races in New York City, New Jersey, Virginia and a redistricting ballot measure in California.

item.title: The Trump administration faces a Monday deadline to tell judges if it will fully fund SNAP
One year out from Election Day 2026, Tuesday's results could shape 2026 midterms
item.description: ABC News is taking a look at the 2026 midterms, now just one year away.

item.title: Hamas returns 3 more Israeli hostages' remains, leaving 8 still in Gaza
item.description: Among the 8 deceased Israeli hostages whose remains are yet to be returned from Gaza is soldier and U.S. citizen Itay Chen.

item.title: Obama, Harris hit the campaign trail; Trump's political operation invests in NJ, Va.
item.description: Barack Obama and Kamala Harris, in separate rallies on Saturday, called to turn out to vote -- as Donald Trump’s political operation invests millions ...

item.title: WATCH: LA Dodgers fans take to streets to celebrate World Series win
item.description: Celebrating fans took to the streets in Los Angeles as the Dodgers won their second consecutive World Series.

item.title: Government shutdown nears record for longest ever as Senate returns
item.description: The government shutdown stretches into Day 34 on Monday as the Senate is set to reconvene. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Judge again bars Trump administration from deploying troops to Portland
Hearings to focus on National Guard deployments in the nation’s capital and Memphis, Tennessee
item.description: Hearings are set in two states over the deployment of the National Guard as part of President Donald Trump’s crime-fighting efforts.
